description:
As Domon travels to Neo China, he is approached by two Shaolin monks who urge him to take on the Gundam Fighter of Neo China, who has apparently gone rogue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Den Dragon Gundam gilt es zu schlagen
Que justice soit faite ! Le maléfique Dragon Gundam
倒せ! 魔神ドラゴンガンダム
